data_description.host: Hostname or IP address of your Resol KM2 or DL2/DL3 device or your json-live-data-server. If json-live-data-server runs as Add-on use 127.0.0.1.
data_description.port: Port of your Resol KM2 or DL2/DL3. Defaults to 80. If you use KM1, VBus/LAN or VBus/USB with json-live-data-server, the default port is 3333.
data_description.username: Username used for logging in to Resol KM2 or DL2/DL3. Not needed for KM1, VBus/LAN or VBus/USB.
data_description.password: Password used for logging in to Resol KM2 or DL2/DL3. Not needed for KM1, VBus/LAN or VBus/USB.
data_description.scan_interval: Defines update frequency. Optional and in seconds. Defaults to 300 (5 min), minimum value is 60 (1 min).
data_description.api_key: Only applicable if you are using DL2/DL3 device. Applies the filter defined on the DL2/DL3. Use the id of the DL2/DL3 defined filter here.
